den = [1 6 21 46 30];

F = (s^4+5*s^3+6*s^2+9*s+30)/(s^4+6*s^3+21*s^2+46*s+30);

\subsection*{Problem 5}

\begin{par}
Also see attached PDF.
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{verbatim}
syms w
F = 5/(s^2*(s^2+w^2));
ilaplace(F)
% TODO: format output.
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim} 
ans =
 
(5*t)/w^2 - (5*sin(t*w))/w^3
 
\end{verbatim} \color{black}
